original_name: Fu lu shou san xing bao xi
plot: Three deities, Fu, Lu and Shou, are banished to the mortal world to lead a life of earthly existence. A fairy, Ma Gu, is sent by the Jade Emperor to assist them in their earthly adventures.
plot_en: Three deities, Fu, Lu and Shou, are banished to the mortal world to lead a life of earthly existence. A fairy, Ma Gu, is sent by the Jade Emperor to assist them in their earthly adventures.
plot_es: Three deities, Fu, Lu and Shou, are banished to the mortal world to lead a life of earthly existence. A fairy, Ma Gu, is sent by the Jade Emperor to assist them in their earthly adventures.
title: Fu lu shou san xing bao xi
